Translations.Text: geuttaeleul aneun bun-eun hananimppun ila ttohan yeolmaega kkeobjil-eul beosgo naoneun geosgwa yeoseong-i imsin-eul haneun geosgwa chulsanhaneun geosdo hananim-eun da asim-ila geunal geudeul-eul bulleo hananim e biyuhaessdeon geosdeul-i eodie issneu nyo lago jilmunhasilini ittae geudeul eun jeohui gaunde han salam-ui jeung-indo-eobsnaida lago daedabhalila
geudeul-i sungbaehaessdeon usangdeul-eun geudeul-eul banghwangkehan hu tteonabeoligo geudeul-eun dopihal gil-i eobs-eum-eul insig halila
ingan-i seon-eul guhal ttaeneun jichi ji anihana saagham-i geuleul seuchil ttaemyeon somang-eul dannyeomhago jeolmang-e ppa jinola

ingan-ege jaeang-i iss-eun hu ha nanim-i geulo hayeogeum geubun-ui eunhye leul masboge hani igeos-eun naui neunglyeog ttaemun-iyo simpan-ui sigan-i olila saeng-gagji anihamyeo naega nae junimkke ileundamyeon naneun geubun-ege joh-eun geos eul gajil su issda lago geuneun malhal geos-ila geuleona hananim-eun bulsinjadeul ege geudeul-i haenghayeossdeon geos-eul allyeo jul geos-imyeo ttohan geubun-eun geudeul-ege gahoghan beol-eul julila
hananim-i ingandeul-ege eunhyeleul bepul ttaemyeon ie deung-eul dollimyeo geo manhae hago jaeang-i geuleul seuchilttaeneun gyesoghayeo guwonhadeola

illeogalodoe igeos-i hananim eulobuteoui gyesila geuleonde neohuigageugeos-eul geoyeoghal ttae neohuineun eotteohge doem-eul alji anhneunyo meolliseo uisim sog-e issneun jaboda deo banghwanghago issneunja nugu-inyo

hananim-i geudeul-ege geubun-ui yejeung-eul daeji an-eseo geuligo geudeul ui yeonghon sog-eseo boyeo julini igeos-i jinliim-eul geudeul-i alttaekkajila junim-i modeun geos-e daehan jung-in-ila neun geos-eulo chungmanhaji anhneunyo
jigeumdo geudeul-eun junimgwaui man nam-eul uisimhago issnani geudeul-eun ha nanimkkeseo modeun geos-eul ewossago iss eum-eul alji moshaneunyo
ha mim
ain ssin kapeu
ileohge hayeo gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasin hananim-eun geudaeege gyesihaessnani geugeos-eun geudae ijeon-e gyesi haessdeon geosgwa gatnola
haneulgwa daejie issneun modeun geos i hananim-ui geos-igeoneul geubun-eun nop i gyesimgwa widaehasim-eulo chungmanhasinila
haneul-i wilobuteo beol-eojigo cheonsadeul-i junim-ui yeong-gwang-eul chanmihamyeo jisang-ui modeun ingan-eul wihae gwan-yong-eul guhani bola sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
geuleona hananim oee daleun geos eul bohojalo sungbaehan jadeul-eun hana nimkkeseo geudeul-eul gamsihanani geudaeneungeudeul-ui chaeg-imjaga anila

ileohdeus hananim-eun geudaeege alab-eolo kkulan-eul gyesihanani ilohayeo geudaega eomeoni dosiui jumin deulgwa geu jubyeon-ui modeun baegseongdeul-ege gyeong-gohago ilbuneun cheongug-e issge doel geos-iyo ilbuneun taoleuneun buljiog-e issge doel uisimhal ba eobsneun geunal-eul gyeong-gohala

hananimkkeseo wonhasyeossdamyeon geubun eun geudeul-eul hanaui gongdongchelo dusyeoss eulila geuleona geubun-eun geubun-i won haneun ja-egeman eunhyeleul bepusinani saaghan jadeul-eun bohojado geuligo guwonjado eobsnola

geuleom-edo geudeul-eun daleun geos-eul bohojalo sungbaehandan mal-inyo geuleo na bohojaneun hananim-isimyeo jug-eunja ege saengmyeong-eul buyeohasineun bundo geu bun-isini geubun-eun modeun il-e jeonji jeonneunghasim-ila
neohuiga eotteon il-e uigyeon-eul dallihadeolado gyeoljeong-eun hananim-i hasi nila ibun-i balo naui junim ha nanim-isila naneun geubunkke uitaghayeo geubunkkelo dol-agalila

geubun-eun cheonjileul changjohasin bun imyeo neohuileul wihae jaung-eul dusa ga chug-edo jaung-eul dueossnola ilo ha yeo neohuileul beonsigke hani geubun-e bi yuhal geos amu geosdo eobsdoda sillo geubun-eun modeun geos-eul deul-eusigo jikyeo bogo gyesinila

haneulgwa daejiui yeolsoedeul-i geubunkke iss-eo geubun-i wonhaneun jaleul wihae il-yonghal yangsig-eul pungseongkedo hasi myeo jehando hasini sillo geubun-eun modeun geos-eul asim-eulo chungmanhasim-ila

geubun-eun noa-ege naelyeojin jong-gyoleul neohuileul wihaeseo hwaglibhayeossna ni geubun-i geudaeege gyesihan geos-i la ttohan geubun-eun abeulahamgwa mose wa yesuegedo myeonglyeonghayeo geu jong-gyo e chungsilhago geu an-eseo bun-yeolhaji malla hasyeossnola hananim anin daleun geosdeul-eul sungbaehan jadeul-eul geudaega geu geos-eulo indohalyeo haneun geu gil-eun eolyeoun geos-ila hananim seuseuloleul wihayeo geubun-i wonhaneun jaleul seontaeg hasimyeo geubunkkelo gwiuihaneun jaleul indohasinila

geudeul-eun jisig-i ileun huedogeudeulgan-ui igisimgwa sigilo bun-yeolhayeossnola geudae junimkkeseo iljeong gigan kkaji malsseum-eul yuyehaji anihaess damyeon imi geudeul saileul simpanhaess-eu lila geudeul ihu seongseoleul mullyeobad-eun jadeuldo geugeos-e gwanhayeo uisimhago issdeola

geuleohan iyulo geudaelo hayeo geum geudeul-eul mid-eum-eulo indohala ham ini geudaega myeonglyeongbad-eundaelo gangjigha la geuligo geudeul-ui yuhog-eul ttaleuji malmyeo illeogalodoe naneun hananimkkeseo gyesihan seongseoleul mid-eumyeo naega myeonglyeong bad-eun daelo neohuileul jeongdanghage maj-i halila hananim-eun uliui junim-iyo neohui junim-isini uliegeneun uli ui haeng-wie daehan chaeg-im-i iss-eumyeo neo huiegeneun neohui haeng-wie daehan chaeg-im i issnola geuleomeulo uliwa neohui saie nonjaeng-i pil-yochi anhnola ha nanim-eun ulileul hamkke bulleo gasini uliui mogjeogjineun geubun-isila
geuleona hananimkke sunjonghagessdago han hu geubun-e gwanhan geudeul-ui non jaeng-eun geudeul junim-ap-eseo mu-ighan geos eulo geubun-ui nohasim-i iss-eul geos-i yo museoun beol-i iss-eul geos-ila
jinliwa jeoulloseo seongseoleul gye sihan bun-i hananim-ila geuleonde nae sega gakkawass-eum-eul mueos-i geudaelo hayeogeum alge haliyo

geugeos-eul midji anihan bulsinjadeul-eun geugeos-eul seong-geubhage jaechoghajimanmidneun jadeul-eun geugeos-eul dulyeowo hamyeo geugeos-i jinliim-eul algo issnola sil lo naesee gwanhayeo nonjaenghaneun geudeul eun keuge banghwanhalila
hananim-eun geubun-ui jongdeul-ege jabilousa geubun-i wonhaneun ja-egeil-yonghal yangsig-eul jusinola sillo geu bun-eun ganghasimgwa gwonneung-eulo chungmanhasim-ila

naeseleul wihan gyeongjagjileul wonha neun ja hananim-eun geuui gyeongjagjileul deohayeo jul geos-imyeo hyeonseleul wihan gyeongjagjileul wonhaneun ja-egeneun geugeos-ui il buleul julila geuleona naeseeseo geu egeneun amuleon mogs-i eobsnola

ideul bulsinjadeul-eun hananim-i heolaghaji anihan bulsin-eul joseonghan satan-ui dongbanjadeul-ila choehu simpan-edaehan naui malsseum-i eobs-eossdeolamyeon i mi geudeul-eul simpanhayeoss-eulila sillo joeindeul-egeneun gotongseuleoun beol-i junbidoeeo issnola

geudaeneun geudeul-i jeojileun geos-i geudeul-ege dagchyeoolila dulyeowo ha neun joeindeul-eul boge doelila geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-eun cheon gug-ui mogjang-eseo geudeul-i wonhaneun mo deun geos-eul geudeul-ui junimgwa deobul-eo man kkighage doelini geugeos-i hananim-ui keuna keun eunhyeila

geugeos-eun hananimkkeseo mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-ege bog-eum jung-ui hanala illeogalodoe naega igeos-eulo neohuiege bosang-eul guhaji anihana gakkaun cheoncheog-e daehan salang-eun je-oe la nugudeunji seon-eul haenghaneun ja hana nim-eun geuege geugeos-eulo bosang-eul deohayeo jul geos-ila sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong gwa seonhaeng-e bodabhasineun bun-isila

geuga hananim-e daehayeo geojis mal handago geudeul-i malhaneunyo hana nimkkeseo wonhasyeossdamyeon geubun-eun geudaeui ma-eum-eul bonghayeo beolyeoss-eulila geuli go hananim-eun geu geojis-eul jegeohago geubun-ui malsseum-eulo jinlileul ibjeunghasyeoss eulila sillo hananim-eun ma-eum-ui bi mil-eul asigo gyesinola
hananim-eun geubun jongdeul-ui hoegae ham-eul bad-a jusa joeleul yongseohayeo ju simyeo neohuiga haenghaneun modeun geosdo algo gyesim-ila
hananim-eun mid-eum-eulo uiloum-eulhaenghaneun ideul-ege gwileul giul-isa geudeul-ege geubun-ui eunhyeleul deohayeo jusa bolsinjadeul-egeneun museoun beol-iiss-eul ppun-ila

hananimkkeseo geubun-ui jongdeul-eul wihae il-yonghal yangsig-eul keuge neomchige handamyeon geudeul-eun jisang-eseo joeag-eul na-eulila geuleona geubun-eun geubun-ui tteus-e ttala jeogjeolhan yang-eul buyeohasi ni sillo geubun-eun geubun-ui jongdeul-eul gwanchalhamyeo jikyeobogo gyesim-ila
salamdeul-i jeolmangsog-e iss-eul ttae bileul naelige hayeo eunhyeleul bepusi neun bundo geubun-isila geuligo geubun eun bohojaija hollo chan-yang bad-eul bun-isila
hananim-ui yejeung-eulo haneulgwa daejiwa geu saie sanjaehan modeun saengmuldeul-i issnola geulihayeo geubun-i wonhasilttae geugeosdeul moduleul jibgyeolsikineun gwonneung-eul gajigo gyesinola
neohuiege jaeang-i il-eonaneun geos-eun neohui sondeul-i eod-eun geos ttaemun-ila geuleona geubun-eun ajig geudeul dae dasuleul yongseohago gyesinila
neohuineun jisang-eseo hoepihal su do eobs-eumyeo hananim oeeneun bohoja do geuligo guwonjado eobsnola
sangat-eun keun baedeul-i badaleul sunhanghaneun geosdo geubun-ui yejeung gaunde hanala
geubun-ui tteus-i iss-eul ttae geubun-eunbalam-eul meomchugehayeo baedeul-i bada wieseo umjig-iji moshage hasinilasillo i an-eneun innaehago gamsaha neun modeun ingan-eul wihan yejeungdeul-i issnola
geubun-eun geudeul-i jeojileun saag ham-eulo geudeul-eul myeolmangke hasilsu iss euna manh-eun geos-eul yongseohasinila
geuleona hananim-ui yejeungdeul-e gwanhayeo nonjaenghaneun ja geudeul-egeneun pihal gil-i eobs-eum-eul alge halila

yeogi neohuiege jueojin modeun geos-eun hyeolse-ui salm-eul wihan sungan-ui yangsig-e bulgwahana hananim gyeot-e issneun geos-eun deo joh-eumyeo yeong-wonhan geos-eulo ineun mid-eum-eulo junimkke uitaghaneun i deul-eul wihan geos-ila
ideul-eun keun joeagdeul-eul pihago bukkeuleoun haeng-wideul-eul pihamyeo hwaga nalttaedo yongseohaneun jadeul-ila
ideul-eun junim-ui buleum-e uiha yeo yebaeleul deuligo il-eul cheoliham-e sangho hyeob-uihamyeo hananim-i geudeul-egebepun il-yonghal yangsig-eulo jaseon-eul be puneun jadeul-ila
ideul-eun geudeul-ege baghaega iss eodo gulboghaji anihago seuseuloleuljikineun jadeul-ila

saagham-e daehan bosang-eun geue sang-eunghaneun beol-i iss-eudoe geuleona gwan yong-eul bepul-eo gaeseonhage haneun janeun hananim-eulobuteo bosang-eul badnola sillo geubun-eun joeindeul-eul salanghaji a ni hasinila
geuleona budangham-eul danghan jaga seuseuloleul bohohagi wihae geuleohge ham-eun binan-eul bad-eul iyuga issji anhnola
sillo binan-eul bad-eul janeun jisang-eseo baegseongdeul-eul baghaehago uilobji moshage joeleul jieun jadeul-ini geudeul egeneun gotongseuleoun beol-i iss-eul ppun ila
geuleona innaehago gwan-yong-eul be puneun geos sillo geugeosdeul-i innaeyo gud-eun gyeolsimjung-ui hanala
hananimkkeseo banghwangke han ja geu egeneun bohojaga eobsnani beol-eul bad neun geudeul-i dasi dol-agal gil-i eobs naikka lago malhaneun joeindeul-eul geu daeneun bolila

geudaeneun cholahan moseub-eulo ji og-e ileumyeo dulyeoum-eulo seologa seololeul heullyeoboneun geudeul-eul bolila geuligo midneun jadeul-i sonsiljadeul-eun buhwal-ui nal jagi jasingwa geudeul-ui chu jongjadeul-eul sangsilhan jadeul-ila malhaneun geos-eul bolila sillo joeindeul-eun yeong-won han beolsog-e issge doenola
geudeul-eun hananim oee geudeul-eul doul bohojaleul gaj-ji moshalini ha nanimkkeseo banghwangke han ja geuegeneun gil-i eobsnola
doedol-a gal su eobsneun eoneu nal-iimhagi jeon-e neohui junim-ui buleum-e eunghala geunal neohuiegeneun pihal gos do eobs-eul geos-imyeo neohui joeag-eul bu-in hal yeojido eobsnola

bulsinjadeul-i geoyeoghanda hadeola do geudaeleul geudeul-ui gamsijalo bonae ji ani haessnani geudaeui immuneun me sejileul jeonhaneun geos-ila sillo hana nimkkeseo geubun-ui eunhyeleul ingan-eulo hayeogeum masboge hal ttae geuneun geugeos-eulo gippeohana geudeul-ui sondeul-i eod-eun geos-eulo inhayeo geudeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul ttaemyeon bola sillo ingan-eun bulsinhanola
haneulgwa daejiui jugwon-eun hana nim an-e iss-eo geubunkkeseo tteus-eul dusigo gyehoeghan geos-eul changjo hasimyeo geubun-ui tteusgwa gyehoeg-e ttala nam-awa yeoaleul jusinila
geubun-eun namseong-gwa yeoseong-eul dagat i dusigo ttohan geubun-ui tteusgwa gyehoeg-e ttala bul-im-eulo dusini sillo geubun-eun asimgwa neunglyeog-eulo chungmanhasinila

hananim-i malsseum-eulo bonaen geos eun ingan-eul tonghaeseoga anila gyesi leul tonghaeseo ttoneun galigae dwieseo sajaleul tonghayeo gyesidoeeoss-eumyeo i neun geubunkkeseo tteus-eul dugo heolaghasin geos-ila sillo geubun-eun nop-i gyesimyeo jihyeloun bun-isila

ileohge hayeo hananim-eun geubun ui myeonglyeong-eulo geudaeege gyesihananigeudaeneun ijeon-e seongseoga mueos-imyeo mid-eum-i mueos-inji alji moshaessnola geuleona hananim-eun kkulan-eul gwangmyeong-eulohago geugeos-eulo geubun-ui tteus-i issneun jongdeul-eul indohadolog hayeossnola sillogeudaeneun ingan-eul olh-eun gillo indoha lila
geu gil-eun haneulgwa daejie issneunmodeun geos-eul soyuhasin hananim-ui gil ila bola modeun geos-i hananimkkelo hyanghaji anhneunyo
ha mim
sasil-eul balghyeojuneun i seongseoe maengsehanila
hananim-eun geugeos-eul alab-eolo gyesihayeoss-euni ilo hayeo neohuiga i haehago baeudolog ham-ila
sillo geugeos-eun hananim seongseoui mojeon-e issneun geos-eulo jihyega gadeug chaewojin geos-ila
neohuiga beos-eonan baegseong-ila hayeohananimkkeseo neohui moduleul bangchihal su issgessneunyo
hananim-i yes baegseongdeul-ege manh-eun-yeeonjadeul-eul bonaess-eumae
yeeonjaga ileuji anihan gos-ieobs-eoss-euna salamdeul-i geuleul jolonghaessnola
geulihayeo hananim-eun ideulboda him-i ganghan geudeul-eul myeolmangke hago yes baegseongdeul-ui biyuga gyohun-i doedo log hayeossnola
geudaega geudeul-ege cheonjileul changjohan bun-i nugusinyo lago mudneundamyeon gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasin hananim-e-uihae changjodoeeossseubnida lago geudeul-eundaedabhalila
geubun-eun daejileul dueo neohuiuihyusigcheolo hasigo geu an-e gil-eul dusini ilo hayeo neohuiga indodoe dolog hagoja ham-ila
geubun-eun iljeonghan yang-ui bileul naelige hasieo jug-eun daejie saengmyeong eul jusidoda geuwa gat-i neohuido buhwal hanola
geubun-eun modeun geos-eul changjohasimae jaung-eul dugo tto neohuiga tal bae deulgwa gachugdeul-eul dueossnola

ilihayeo neohuiga deung-wieseo anjeonghago neohuiga geugos-e anjeonhage anj-a iss-eul ttae neohui junim-eul yeom-wonha myeo jeohuiga geuleohge hal su eobsneun geos eul jeohuiege sunjongke hayeo jusin geubunkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo lago mal hago
jeohuineun jeohui junimkkelo dol-a gage doenaida lago malhadolog ham ila
geuleona bulsinjadeul-eun geubun-ui ilbu jongdeul-i hananim-ui bunsin-ila mal hani sillo ingan-eun omanbulsonhadoda
hananimkkeseo seuseuloleul wihae ttaldeul-eul taeghasigo neohuineun adeul-eul seontaeghadolog hayeossdan mal-inyo
jabilousin hananimkke biyuhaess deon sosig-i geudeul-ege ileulttaemyeon geu ui eolgul-eun eodueojimyeo gip-eun seulpeum eulo gadeug chadeola
jangsig-eulo yang-yugdoen geunyeodeul-eul hananimkke biyuhalyeo hana geugeos-eun hananimgwa biyuhal iyuga doeji mos haji anhneunyo

geuligo bulsinjaneun jabilousin hananim-ui jongdeul-in cheonsadeul-eul yeoseong-i la hadeola geudeul-eun cheonsadeul-i changjo doel ttae moggyeog-ilado hayeossdan mal-inyo geudeul-ui jeung-geoneun gilogdoeeo jilmun-eul badge doelila
geudeul-eun jabilousin hananimkkeseo wonhasyeossdamyeon jeohuineun gyeolko geugeos deul-eul sungbaehaji anihaess-eulilago malhana geudeul-ui mal-eneun jisig-i eobs neun geojismal-ila
animyeon hananimkkeseo geudeul-ege igeos ijeon-e seongseoleul jueo geudeullo hayeogeum geuleohge ttaleudolog haessdan mal inyo
geuleohji anhnola jeohuineun jeohui seonjodeul-i ttalassdeon jong-gyoleul balgyeonhayeo geudeul-ui gil-eul seuseulo ttaleul ppun-ibni da lago geudeul-eun malhadeola

hananim-i geudae ijeon baegseongdeul ege gyeong-gojaleul bonaess-eul ttaemada geu deul jung-ui buyuhan salamdeuldo jeohuineun jeohui seonjodeul-i ttalassdeon jong-gyoleul bal gyeonhayeo geudeul-ui gil-eul ttaleul ppun-ibni da lago hadeola

modeun seonjijaneun neohuiga seonjo deullobuteo balgyeon han geosboda deo na-eun bog-eum-eul gajigo wassnolago malhaess-euna bulsinjaneun dangsindeul-eul tonghayeo bonaeeojin geos-eul midji anhneunda malhadeola
geulihayeo hananim-i geu beol-eul naelisini bola jinlileul geoyeoghaneun jadeul-ui malloga eotteo haessdeonyo
abeulaham-eun geuui abeojiwa baegseongdeul-ege malhagil sillo jeoneun yeo leobun-i sungbaehaneun geos-eul sungbaehaji anihamyeo
naleul changjohasin hananimman-eul gyeongbaehanani sillo geubunkkeseo naleul indohasil geos-ila
abeulaham-eun geuui husondeul-egei mal-eul namgyeoss-euni amado geudeul-eun hananimkkelo dol-agalila
geuleona hananim-eun ideulgwa i deul seonjodeul-ege jinliwa sasil-eul balghyeojuneun han seonjijaga imhal ttaekka ji hyeonse-ui salm-eul hyanglaghadoleug dueoss nola
geuleona jinliga geudeul-ege i leuleoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun igeos-eun masul-e bulgwahani ulineun igeos-eul midji anh eulilago malhadeola
bulsinjaneun i kkulan-i du dosi ui jidoja-egeneun gyesidoeji ani hayeossdeonyo lago muddeola

geudeul-i geudae junim-ui eunhyeleul bunbaehandan mal-inyo hyeonse-ui saenghwalsog eseo geudeul-ege saenghwal-ui yangsig-eul bun baehaneun geos-eun hananim-isila geudeuljung-ilbuegeneun jiwileul daleun ja boda nop-i dueo geudeullo hayeogeum daleun jadeul-eul jidohadolog hayeossnola geuleonageudae junim-ui eunhyeneun geudeul-i chugjeog han jaemulboda deoug joh-eun geos-ila

baegseongdeul-i bulsin-ui muliga doe lyeo haji ani handamyeon hananim-eun jabilousin geubun-eul modoghan gagjaleul wihae geudeul-ui jib jibung-gwa geudeul-i oleuneun gyedan-eul eun-eulo jangsighayeo jul sudo iss-eulila
geudeul-ui jib mundeuldo geuligo geudeul-ui gidaeneun chimsangdo eun-eulo jangsig doel su iss-eumyeo
geum-eulodo jangsigdoel su iss-euli la geuleona i modeun geos-eun hyeonsesaeng hwal-ui hyanglag-e bulgwahamyeo geudae junim ap-ui naeseneun uiloun jadeul-eul wihae issnola
hananim-eun geubun-ui jabilousingyohun-eulobuteo oemyeonhaneun jaleul wihaesatan-eul dusa satan-i geuui chinguga doedeola
geulihayeo satandeul-i geudeullo hayeogeum baleun gil-eseo beos-eonage ha na geudeul-eun seuseuloga olh-eun gillo indodoeneun geos-eulo saeng-gaghanola
geuga hananimkke ileuleo malha deola neowa na saie dongjjoggwa seo jjog saiui geoli mankeum-ina saiga iss-eoss-eumyeon joh-ass-eulyeonman sillo saaghanmulila
neohuiga jeojileun joeag-eulo in hayeo geunal-eneun eoneu geosdo neohuie ge yuyonghaji moshani neohuineun hamkke beol-eul bad-eulila
geudaeneun gwimeogeolilo hayeogeum deudge hal su iss-eumyeo jangnimgwa banghwanghaneun jaleul indohal su issneunyo
hananim-i geudaeleul geoduwogan huelado geubun-eun geudeul-ege eungbeol eul naelisinila
hananimkkeseo geudeul-ege yagsoghan geos-eul geudaeege boyeo julini sillo geubun-eun geudeul-eul jeabhal neunglyeog-eulo chungmanhasinila
geudaeege gyesidoen geos-eul jiki la sillo geudaeneun godbaleun gil-wie issnola
sillo geugeos-eun geudaewa geudae baegseong-eul wihan bog-eum-ini neohuiga god jilmun-eul bad-eulila
geudae ijeon hananim-ui seonjija deul-ege mul-eobola jabilousin ha nanim oee daleun geos-eul sungbaehala ha yeossdeonyo
hananim-eun geubun-ui malsseumgwa deobul-eo moseleul palaowa geuui chujongjadeul-ege bonaeni naneun man-yuui junim-i bonaen han seonjijala malhayeossdeola
geuleona geuga hananim-ui malsseum eul gajigo geudeul-ege gass-eul ttae geudeul eun bius-eossnola
geulihayeo hananim-eun chalyelo ijeon-ui geosboda deo keun geos-eulo geudeul eul beolhayeo geudeul-i hananim-egelo gwiuihagileul balaessnola
geudeul-i malhagil o masulsayeo geubunkkeseo dangsinkke seong-yaghan daelo u lileul wihae gidohala geulihamyeon u liga dangsin-eul mid-euliyo lago hadeo la
hananimkkeseo geudeullobuteo beol-eulgeodueo juni bola geudeul-eun yagsog-eul kkaetteulinola
palaoneun geuui baegseongdeul-ege baegseongdeul-iyeo aegub-ui wang-gug-i na an e issji anhneunyo ttohan gangmul-i nae gungjeon mit-eulo heuleuji anhneunyo geulae do neohuineun ihaehaji moshaneunyo
bojalgeos eobsneun geuligo ungbyeondo eobsneun i sanaeleul bola naega deo hul lyunghaji anhneunyo
geuegeneun geumpaljjido eobs-eumyeo cheonsadeuldo geuleul ttalaojido anhneundanmal-inyo
ileohdeus geuneun geuui baegseongdeul-eul eoliseogge hani geudeul-eun geuege bog jonghayeoss-eumae sillo geudeul-eun joejieun baegseongdeul-ieossnola
geudeul-i hananim-eul yogdoege ha yeoss-eul ttae geubun-eun geudeul-ege eungbeol-eul naelisa geudeul moduleul mul-e igsake hayeossnola
hananim-eun geudeul-ui seonlyeleul hu sedaeleul wihan gyohun-eulo sam-assnola
maliaui adeul yesuleul yeleul deulmyeon geudaeui baegseong-eun geuleul jolongha myeo solan-eul piugo
uliui sindeul-i hullyunghanyo a nimyeon geuga hullyunghanyo lago geudeul-eun malhaessdeola ileohdeus geudeul-eun geudaeegenonjaenghalyeo hayeoss-euni nonjaeng-eul ilsamneunmulideul-ila
geuneun han jong-e bulgwahanila hananim-eun geuege eunhyeleul bepul-eo i seula-el jason-eul wihan gyohun-i doege hayeossnola
hananim-i wonhasyeossdamyeon geubun-euncheonsadeullo hayeogeum daejiwiui gyeseungjaga doel su issge hayeoss-eulila
sillo yesuui jaelim-eun simpan-i dagaom-eul yesihaneun geos-ila illeo galodoe geu sigag-e daehayeo uisimchi malgo naleul ttaleula igeos-i olh-eun gil-ila
geuligo satan-i neohuileul yuhog haji moshadolog hala sillo geuneun neohuiui bunmyeonghan jeog-ila

yesuga bunmyeonghan yejeung-gwa deobul-eo geudeul-ege ileuleo malhagil naega jihyeleul gajigo neohuiege wassnani neohuiga nonjaenghaneun geos-eul balghyeo jugess nola geuleomeulo hananim-eul dulyeowo hago naege sunjonghala
hananim-eun naui junim-iyo tto han neohuiui junim-ila geuleomeulo geu bunman-eul gyeongbaehala igeos-i baleun gil inila
geuleona geudeul jung-ui mulideul-eun uigyeon-eul dalli haess-euni geudeul joeindeul egeneun gotongseuleoun nal beol-i iss-eu lila
geudeul-eun alji moshaneun sungan-e dagchyeool geu siganman-eul gidaligo iss dan mal-inyo
geunal-ui chingudeul-eun seologa seo lo-ege jeog-i doelila geuleona uilo un jadeulman-eun je-oela
naui jongdeul-iyeo geunal-ui neohui egeneun dulyeoumdo seulpeumdo eobsnola
ideul-eun hananim-ui malsseum-eul mid eo iseullam-e gwiuihan jadeul-ini
neohuiwa geuligo anaega hamkke cheongug-eulo deul-eogala neohuiga gippeohalila

hwang-geum-ui jeobsideulgwa keobdeul-i geu deul juwileul maemdolmyeo geu an-eneun geudeul-ui yeonghon-i wonhaneun modeun geosgwa geudeul-ui nundeul-eul gappeohage hal modeun geosdeul-i issnani neohuineun geu an-eseo yeongsaenghal geos-ila
geugeos-eun neohuiga haenghan daega-e ttala mullyeo bad-eun cheongug-eulo
neohuineun geu an-eseo pungseonghan gwail-eul masbomyeo geugeos-e manjoghalila
geuleona joeindeul-egeneun jiog-uibeol-i iss-eul geos-imyeo geudeul-eun geugos-e seo yeongjuhage doenola
geudeul-eul wihae geu beol-i gabyeowojil su eobs-euni geudeul-eun geu an-eseo jeolmanghadoda
igeos-eun hananim-i geudeul-eul bu danghage han geos-i anila seuseuloleul yogdoege han geos-eun geudeul jasindeul-ieoss nola
ittae geudeul-eun ju-in-isiyeo ju nim-eulo hayeogeum beol-eul geodueo judo log hayeo jusoseo lago hosohani geuleol su eobsnola neohuineun geugos-eseo salge doelila daedabhasideola
hananimkkeseo neohuiege jinlileuljueossgeonman neohui daedasuneun geu jinli leul jeung-ohamyeo
geudeul seuseulo eummoleul kkumyeoss-eu na hananim-eun seunglike hayeossnola
hananimkkeseo geudeul-i sumgineun geosgwa geudeul-i jugobadneun bimil-ui dae hwaleul deudji mosham-ila saenglahaneunyo anila ttohan cheonsadeul-i gilogha nila
illeogalodoe jabiloun hananimkkeseo adeul-eul gajyeossdamyeon naege jeil meonjeo gyeongbaehaneun jaga doelila
cheonjiui junimmisimyeo gwonja-e oleusil junimkke myeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo sillo geubun-eun bulsinjadeul-i myosahan bun-i anisila
geuleomeulo geojisgwa yogdoeneun mal e tamnighan geudeul-eul geudaelo dula geudeul-i yagsogbadneun geunal-eul maj-ihalila
geubun-eun haneul-edo gyesimyeo dae jiwiedo gyesineun hananim-eulo jihyewa asim-eulo chungmanhasin bun-isila
haneulgwa daejiwa geu saie issneun modeun wang-gug-i geubun-ui geos-eulo geubunkke chugbog-i iss-eusoseo geubunman-i simpan-ui nal-eul algo gyesini neohuineun geubunkkelo dol-a ganola
hananim anin daleun geos-eul sungbaehan jadeul-egeneun jungjaehal neunglyeog-i eobs eudoe jinlileul jeung-eonhan janeun ye-oelo geudeul-eun geuleul algo issnola
geudeul-eul changjohan bun-i nugu-i nyo mudneundamyeon hananim-ilago geudeul-eunmalhanila geuleomyeonseodo geudeul-eun jinlilobuteo oemyeonhalyeo haneunyo
juyeo sillo geudeul-eun midji anhneunbaegseongdeul-ibnida lago malhaneun yeeonjaui oechim-i deullyeossnola
geudaeyeo geudeullobuteo meolli ha la geuligo annyeonghi iss-eula malhala geudeul-eun god alge doelila
ha mim
sasil-eul balghyeojuneun i seongseoemaengsehamyeo
hananim-eun geugeos-eul chugbogbad-eun bam-e gyesihaessnani geugeos-eulo gyeong-goha goja ham-ila
geunal bam modeun jiheloun ildeul i myeongbaeghayeojini
hananim-ui myeonglyeong-ila sillo geubunkkeseo seonjijadeul-eul bonaessnola
geugeos-eun junim-eulobuteoui jabi la sillo hananim-eun deul-eusigo asi neun bun-isila
neohuiga hwagsilhan mid-eum-eul gajil ttae geubun-eun haneulgwa daeji geuligo geusaie issneun manmul-ui junim-isila
geubun oeeneun sin-i eobs-eumyeo saeng myeong-eul jusigo saengmyeong-eul as-a gasineun bundo geubun-eulo neohuiui junim-iyo ttohan neohui josang-ui junim-isila
geuleona geudeul-eun uisimhamyeo jolong hani
haneul-i jit-eun yeongilo gadeug chaneun geunal-eul geudaeneun jikyeobolila
yeongiga salamdeul-eul deop-eo gali uni gotongseuleoun beol-ila
bulsinjadeul-eun juyeo jeohuiege i beol-eul geodueo jusoseo jeohuiga mid gessnaida
geu gyohun-i geudeul-ege yuyongha gessneunyo jinlileul balghyeojuneun seonjijaga geudeul-ege imi imhasyeossdoda
geuleona geudeul-eun geulobuteo deung eul dollimyeo geuga michinjala malhadeo la
hananimkkeseo jamsi eungbeol-eul geo dueo jumyeon neohuineun dasi saagham-eu lo dol-agal geos-ila
gajang gyeoglyeolhan eungbeol-i iss-eul geunal hananim-eun gotongseuleoon beol-eul ga halila
hananim-eun geudeul ijeon-ui pala o baegseong-eul siheomhayeoss-euni hullyunghan seonjijaga geudeul-ege imhayeo
hananim-ui jongdeul-eul naege neomgyeo juo sillo naneun neohuiege on mid-eum ui seonjijala malhadeola
hananimkke geoyeoghamyeo omanhajimalla sillo naega bunmyeonghan neunglyeog-eul neo huiege boyeo julila
neohuiga naleul haechilyeo hal ttae naneun naui junim-imyeo neohui junim-in hananimkke guwon-eul cheonghalila
neohuiga naleul midji anihanda myeon naleul hollo dula
sillo ideul-eun joejieun baegseong-ib nida lago junimkke gidohadeola
ie daedab-i iss-eoss-eumae neohui ga chujeog-eul danghalini naui jongdeulgwa deobul-eo bam-e tteonala
badaneun gallajin chaelo dueola geudeul-eun igsahage doel mulideul-ila
geudeul-i namgin gwasuwongwa umul deul-i eolmana manh-eunyo
jeondabgwa hullyunghan hyusigcheowa
hyanglag-e tamnighaessdeon geu pung-yolo un jaemuldo
geuleohge hayeo kkeut-i nago ha nanim-eun igeosdeul-eul daleun baegseong-ege sangsogke haessnola
geudeul-eul wihae haneuldo ttangdo nunmul-eul heulliji anihaess-eumyeo geudeul-ege neun yuyedo eobs-eossnola
hananim-eun gul-yog-ui jaeang-eulo buteo iseula-el baegseong-eul guhayeoss-euni
palaolo buteola sillo geuneun omanhan joein-ila
hananim-eun jihyelosseo yeoleo min jogjung-eseo geudeul-eul seontaeghaeseo
geudeul-ege yejeungdeul-eul buyeoha yeoss-euni geu an-eneun bunmyeonghan siheom-i eossnola
ideul-eun malhadoda
uliga hanbeon jug-eumyeon dasi buhwaldoeji anhnola
geuleomeulo neohuiga jinsil-ilamyeon-uli seonjodeul-eul doedollyeo jula hani
geudeul-eun tubaui baegseong-gwa ijeon ui baegseongdeul boda ganghada saeng-gaghaneu nyo hananim-eun geudeul-i nah-eun joeag-eu lo malmiam-a geudeul-eul myeolmangke haessno la
hananimkkeseo cheonjileul changjohagogeu saie issneun modeun geos-eul changjohan geos-eun dansunhan olag-i anila
geugeosdeul-eul jinlilo changjohayeoss-eudoe geudeul daedasuneun ihaehaji mosha nola
sillo simpan-ui nal-eun geudeul modu leul wihae jeonghayeojin nal-ini
geunal-eun chinguga geuui chingue ge yuyonghaji anihago doumdo bad eul su eobsneun nal-ila
geuleona hananimkkeseo eunhyeleul bepun janeun je-oela sillo hananim-eun gwonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
sillo jakkumu namuga
joeindeul-ui eumsig-i doeeo
nog-eun soesmulcheoleom doeeo geudeul-ui wi sog-eseo kkeunh-eo oleuni
deulkkeulhneun tteugeoun mulgwa gatdeola
geuttae eumseong-i deullyeooni geuleul delyeoga taoleuneun buljiog-eulo neoh-eula
geuligo geuui meoli wieneun deulkkeulhneun mul-i bueojimyeo
igeos-eul masbola sillo neoyamal lo hullyonghago him-i sen jala
sillo igeos-i nega uisimhaessdeon geos-ila
geuleona uiloun jadeul-eun anjeon han gos-e issge doenani
nag-wongwa umuldeul-i issneun gos-ila
seomsehan silkeuwa bidan os-eul geolchigo seoloui eolgul-eul masboge doeli la
geuleohdeus eunhyeleul bepeulgo aleum dabgo nun-i keun baeujileul gyeolhabsikyeo juni
geudeul-eun geugos-eseo ongaj gwail eul pyeonghwalomge jeulgidoda
geudeul-eun hanbeon-ui jug-eum oeeneun dasi jug-eum-eul masboji anihamyeo ha nanim-eun taoleuneun buljiog-ui beollobuteo geudeul-eul bohohayeo jusinila
igeos-i geudae junim-ui eunhyeyo choegoui seunglila
hananim-eun kkulan-eul geudaeui eon eolo gyesihaessgeoneul ilo hayeo geudeul i gyohun-eul eoddolog ham-ila
geuleomeulo geudaeneun gidalimyeo jikyeobola geudeuldo yeogsi gidaligo issnola
ha mim
igeos-eun gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasin hananim-eulobuteo gyesidoen seongseo la
sillo haneulgwa daejie midneun sa lamdeul-eul wihan yejeung-i iss-eumyeo
neohuileul changjohan geosgwa daejiwie sanjaehayeo issneun geosdo midneun jadeul-eul wihan yejeung-ila

najgwa bam-i gyochadoeneun geosdo ha nanimkkeseo haneullobuteo il-yonghal yangsig eul jusineun geosdo geuligo jug-eun daejileul sosaengkehamyeo balam-ui banghyang-eulbyeonhwasikineun geosdo ihaehaneun baegseong deul-eul wihan yejeung-ila
geugeosdeul-i hananimkkeseo jinlilo sseo geudaeege nangsonghan geubun-ui yejeung deul-ila geulaedo hananimgwa geubun-ui yejeung-eul geoyeoghandamyeon geudeul-eun eotteon mal-eul midneundan mal-inyo
geojishaneun modeun joeindeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
amsongdoen hananim-ui malsseum-eul deul-eungeuga geu malsseum-eul deudji anihaessdeon geoscheoleom geomanhago omanhae hani geue ge gotongseuleoun eungbeol-i iss-eul geos-i lago jeonhal
hananim-ui yejeung-eul deul-eoss-eul ttae geugeosdeul-eul jolonghan geuegedo gotongseuleoun beol-i iss-eulila

geudeul ap-eneun jiogppun-imyeo geudeul-i eod-eossdeon eotteon geosdo yuyonghaji anihamyeo hananim oeeneun geudeul-eul wihae eotteon bohojado eobsnani geudeul egeneun museoun eungbeol bakk-en eobsnola
igeos-i balo gil-ila geuleom-eulo junim-ui yejeung-eul geoyeoghaneun ja geudeul-egeneun gotongseuleoun beol-i iss-eul ppun-ila

badalo hayeogeum neohuiege sun jongke hayeo geubun-ui myeonglyeong-eulo baega hanghaehage hago geugeos-eulo inhayeo geubun-ui eunhyeleul guhage hasin bun-i hananim-isila geuleomeulo neohuineun gam sahala
geubun-eun haneulgwa daejiwie iss neun modeun geos-i neohuiege sunjongtolog hayeossnani sillo geu an-eneun saeng-gagha neun salamdeul-eul wihan yejeungdeul-i issno la
hananim-ui naldeul-eul dulyeowo haji anihan geudeul-eul yongseohan midneun geudeul-ege illeo galodoe hananim-eun geu deul-i eod-eun geos-e ttala baegseongdeul-ege bosanghasinila
uiloum-eul silcheonhan ja geugeos-eunjagiui yeonghon-eul wihaeseoyo ag-eul peo tteulin ja geugeos-eun seuseulo yeoghaengdoeneun geos-eulo neohui moduga neohui junimkke gwiuihanola
sillo hananim-eun iseula-el jasondeul-ege seongseowa jugwongwa yeeon jadeul-eul jueoss-eumyeo ttohan daleun baegseong e useonhayeo joh-eun il-yonghal yangsig-eul jueossnola

geuligo hananim-eun geudeul-ui jong-gyoe bunmyeonghan yejeung-eul jueoss-eudoe geu deul gaunde sigiwa jiltulo inhayeo geudeul-ege jisig-i ileulttae kkajineun uigyeon-eul dallihaji anihaessnola sillojunimkkeseo buhwal-ui nal geudeul-i uigyeon eul dallihaessdeon geos-e gwanhayeo simpan-eul hasilila
geuhu hananim-eun geudaeleul baleun gil wie dueoss-euni geudaeneun geu gil eul ttaleudoe alji moshaneun jadeul-ui yu hog-eul ttaleuji malla
geudeul-eun hananim ap-eseo geudae ege yuyongchi moshanila joeindeul-eun seologa seolo-ege chinguga doeeo ju na hananim-eun uiloun jadeulman-ui bo hojaga doeeo jusinola
igeos-i ingan-eul wihan bich-iyo gil-imyeo uiloun baegseong-eul wihan eunhyela

hananimkkeseoneun saaghan haeng-wileul han jadeul-ui saengmyeong-gwa jug-eum-eul mid-eum-eu lo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeulgwa gatge hal geos-ila saeng-gaghaneunyo geuleohge pandan haneun geos-eun keuge jalmosdoen geos-ila
hananimkkeseo jinlilo cheonjileul changjohasa modeun ingan-i eodgoja ha neun geos-eul eodge hasini eoneu nugudo bujeonghage dalueojiji anhnola

meosdaelo sin-eul mandeul-eo naeneun ja leul geudaega bolini hananim-eun geuleul banghwangke hasyeoss-eumae geuui gwiwa ma-eum eul bonghayeo beoligo geuui sigagdo bong hayeo beolyeoss-euni hananim oee nuga geuleul indohaliyo geuleom-edo neohui neun suggohaji anhneunyo

hyeonseeseoneun saneun geos oee mueos-i issneunyo uliga jug-eumyeon daleun sedaega salge doelini igeos-eun sewol i geuleohge hal ppun-ilago malhani sillo geudeul-eun alji moshago danji chucheughal ppun-ila
hananim-ui malsseum-i geudeul-ege nangsongdoel ttae neohuiga jinsil-ilamyeon u liui seonjodeul-eul dasi ileuge hayeo bolaneun nonjaeng bakk-en haji moshadeola

illeogalodoe neohuiege saengmyeong-euljusa saengmyeong-eul as-a gasimyeo uisimhal su eobsneun simpan-ui nal neohuileul dasi moidolog hasineun bun-eun hananim-isila geuleona daedasuui salamdeul-i i haehaji moshadeola
haneulgwa daejiui wang-gug-i hana nim-ui geos-imyeo simpan-ui sigag-i hwaglib doeeo issnola geunal-i doemyeon geojishaess deon geudeul-eun myeolmanghage doenila
geunal muleup-eul kkulh-eun muliga geudeul-ui gilog-e uihae bulliwo ganeun mulileul geudaega bolini oneul-eun neohui ga haenghan geos-eulo bosang-eul badge doelilaneun soliga deullyeo odeola
igeos-eun jinlilosseo neohuie dae hayeo iyagi hayeo jul hananim-ui gilog-eulo geubun-eun neohuiga haenghan geos-eul giloghasinola
mid-eum-eulo uiloum-eul silcheonhan geudeul-eul junimkkeseoneun geubun-ui eunhye gaunde deulge hasini geugeos-i choego ui seunglila
geuleona bulsinjadeul-egeneun hana nim-ui malsseum-i neohuiege issji ani haessneunyo neohuineun omanhan joeindeul-ieossnola

hananim-ui yagsog-eun jinliimyeo uisimhal ba eobsneun naesega jinlilaneun malsseum-i iss-eoss-eul ttae naesega mueos-i nyo geugeos-eun hanaui saeng-gag-e bulgwahan geos-eulo saeng-gaghamyeo midji anhneundago neohuineun malhagon haessnola
geuttae geudeul-i haenghan modeun ag-uigyeolgwaga natanani geudeul-eun jasindeul-i jolonghaessdeon geosdeul-e uihae wanjeonhi po wi doedeola

inal-eun neohuiga hananimgwaui mannam-eul mang-gaghaessdeon geoscheoleom geubun-eun neohuileul gieoghaji aneo halila geuleomeulo neohuiui geojujineun buljiog-imyeo neohuineun guwonjado gaj-ji moshanola

igeos-eun neohuiga hananim-ui ye jungdeul-eul jolonghaessgo neohuiga hyeonsesaenghwal e yuhogdoeeossgi ttaemun-ila geulihayeo neohuineun geunallobuteo geugos-eseo heeo nal sudo eobs-eumyeo eunhyeleul bad-eul sudo eobsnola
geuleomeulo haneul-ui junim-iyo daejiui junim-isimyeo man-yuui junim-i sin hananim-eul chanmihala
haneulgwa daejileul tonghayeo yeong-gwang eul bad-eusoseo hananim-eun gwonneung-gwa ji hyelo chungmanhasin bun-isila
